channel.title: Ok Help?
channel.description:
Im coding v3 and im adding anti syi wich i did areldy and block invaild names and added anti null.
Ok so im block names that are like this example
~@#$r@#$%$#^&y^^&*()_
Put my name in the game is mod google so if i try to log in in my account it auto banns me for invail user cuse I have a space in my name
Do you guys know how can I allow my self to log in as that name and not other players please tell me and thank you

item.title: Ok Help?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Remove the _. If you havenâ€™t noticed, when you enter an underscore, even in runescape, it will automatically change the underscore to a space.

Read full topic
